```{r setup}
library(MATH4753)

# load the fire dataset included in the package
data("fire")

# look at basic structure
head(fire)
summary(fire)
str(fire)

plot(
  fire[[1]], fire[[2]],
  xlab = names(fire)[1],
  ylab = names(fire)[2],
  main = "Fire data: first two variables"
)

x <- fire[[1]]

boot_out <- myboot2(
  iter = 2000,
  x    = x,
  fun  = "mean",
  alpha = 0.05
)

boot_out

ntickets(N = 100, gamma = 0.05, p = 0.8)

out_curve <- myncurve(mu = 0, sigma = 1, a = 1.5)
out_curve

out_cltp <- mycltp(n = 30, iter = 1000, lambda = 4)
head(out_cltp)
```
